title: Losing Control: How Do You Become an Angry, Aggressive Person?
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: When it comes to anger, is catharsis truly effective or does it just feel good? This week on All the Rage we look at the catharsis theory and talk about what role venting anger through options like rage rooms play in aggression. Dr. Brad Bushman joins us again to explain his research about what happens when we vent our anger.
itunes:subtitle: When it comes to anger, is catharsis truly effectâ€¦
description: When it comes to anger, is catharsis truly effective or does it just feel good? This week on All the Rage we look at the catharsis theory and talk about what role venting anger through options like rage rooms play in aggression. Dr. Brad Bushman joins us again to explain his research about what happens when we vent our anger.
